publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8213 Kenneth Gibson: Congratulations to Aaron Horn, Winner of Karate Goldâ€”That the Parliament congratulates 17-year-old Aaron Horn of Dalry, in Ayrshire, on his recent gold medal success at the Portuguese Karate Open; recognises that Aaron overcame what it considers was fierce international competition to reach the final in which he convincingly defeated his French opponent 8-1; believes Aaron to be an outstanding young sporting talent, and wishes him the best of luck in future competitions. Supported by: Stewart Maxwell*, Stuart McMillan*, Michael Matheson*, Jamie McGrigor*, John Lamont*
